name: Superstar Hero - Soundtrack
detailed_description:
This is the original Superstar Hero soundtrack, in higher quality. The soundtrack gets installed inside the Superstar Hero game folder (for example, "C:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\common\Superstar Hero\soundtrack"). The music is heavily inspired from 16-bit era games and power metal.

Track list:
1. Superstar Hero - 02:18
2. Beginning of a Superstar Hero Journey - 00:59
3. Clouded Future - 02:27
4. Mysterious Island - 01:44
5. Generic Battle - 01:29
6. 9108 A.D. - 01:32
7. Dark Story - 01:54
8. La Porte du Soleil (80's Remix) - 04:53
9. The Ballad Song that Goes Bersek (Saint-Roch District Version) - 02:52
10. Hardcore Spectrum Disorder (Radio Mix) - 04:32
11. Maze of Life - 04:20
12. Destination 1999 A.D. (Superstar Hero Version) - 03:38
13. Frozen Danger - 01:44
14. An Obestian Tale - 02:43
15. Ears of Sarosto (Alternate Mix) - 04:20
16. Rejection - 04:18

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card

Minimum:
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
